short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Garden your system resources to prevent your plant from dying

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Performance Gardener displays your available system resources as a plant. It is your job to keep it healthy to prevent your browser tabs from slowing down. You can do this by limiting the amount of open tabs or by watering your plant.

Watering your plant will keep your tabs open but remove the content from memory improving the performance of you current tab.
